data.title: Deanna Grams on LinkedIn: TuneIn Adds WSJ Radio In Partnership With Dow Jones.
data.meta_description: So excited to add WSJ to TuneIn! #tunein
data.text:
The wait is finally over, The BIG 615 is here! TuneIn and Garth Brooks are bringing the new Music City sound to the world. Hear new music from emerging artists, superstars, and favorite icons on The BIG 615. Exclusively on TuneIn. https://lnkd.in/gMDQ_UsY

Exciting news! üì£ Country music fans, prepare for Garth Brooks to take over your airwaves! We just announced that TuneIn will be the home to his brand new SEVENS Radio Network launching this summer. This radio network will feature multiple stations dedicated to country music and beyond, all hand-picked by Garth Brooks himself! Stay tuned for more details, and get ready to turn up the tunes with Garth Brooks on SEVENS Radio! https://lnkd.in/gPBE2ABK

Radio is an art form, and like any artistic medium, it thrives when creators connect with their audience. While there is a lot of effort going into creating radio with artificial intelligence and synthetic voices, this approach misses the whole point radio. It's not just hearing a playlist, it's feeling connected to the people who love what you love. It‚Äôs about how imperfect moments achieve perfection on air. That‚Äôs magic for our listeners, and that‚Äôs why TuneIn is investing in passionate creators like Debbie and Tom. ‚ù§Ô∏è #reinventradio

Happy Native Language Day! Yesterday was the day to celebrate the beauty of diversity in languages, dialects and cultures. We all have the privilege to explore so many new perspectives through the art of language. And what better way to celebrate than with TuneIn Explorer?! Bridge the gap between people of different languages by tuning in to music, stories and news from around the globe. Give it a try- you might find something amazing! tunein.com/explorer
